PublicationsCVProjectsFamily History

Online Books

This collection containa a number of online books that have been edited by Gregor von Laszewski and contain many contributions from students.

Selected Publications

More refernces can be found at the Publications Page

    1. von Laszewski, G. (2020). Cloud Computing [Online Book]. Indiana University. https://cloudmesh-community.github.io/pub/vonLaszewski-cloud.pdf
